summary: The King of Thieves disrupts Aladdin and Jasmine's long-anticipated wedding, looking for an oracle that will lead him to an even bigger treasure. His true identity causes trouble for Aladdin.
cast: Val Bettin|Jim Cummings|Gilbert Gottfried|Linda Larkin|Jerry Orbach|John Rhys-Davies|Scott Weinger|Frank Welker|Robin Williams|Jeff Bennett|Corey Burton|Jess Harnell|Clyde Kusatsu|Rob Paulsen|CCH Pounder|Bruce Adler|Joan Barber|Scott Barnes|Liz Callaway|Bill Farmer|Merwin Foard|David Friedman|Paul Kandel|Brad Kane|Alix Korey|Marin Mazzie|Patrick Pinney|Peter Samuel|Gordon Stanley|Guy Stroman|Molly Wasserman
keywords: no opening credits|scene after end credits|surprise after end credits|aladdin|thieves
